item.description:
Thanksgiving Day Open House

All are welcome!

Cocktails and light Apps: 4:00pm - 5:00 pm

Dinner: Turkey and all the fixings: Between 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm

Dessert: Around 5:30 pm-ish

Yak time: Anytime!

BYOB for those that wish to indulge!

Schedule may vary slightly If you cannot make it for dinner, but you'd like to stop by to say hi or partake in a drink that's fine too, or maybe you prefer to stop by for some dessert ! No formalities---No Reservation Necessary!

If your coming for the main course please reserve so I know how many to plan for!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Thanksgiving Day Open House Invitational Time Change!
